_meanings:
{@--1@} To go away,
depart, withdraw, retire, run away,
escape; {#apehi#} begone, avaunt, away,
hence, get you gone; to disappear,
vanish, pass away; die or perish
also; {#DarmaScApEti#} <ls>Ms. 1. 82</ls>;  
{#hfdayAtpratyAdeSavyalIkamapEtu te#} <ls>Åš. 7. 24</ls>; {#ramyA#} 

{#navadyutirapEti na SAdvaleByaH#} <ls>Ki. 5. 37</ls>
does not leave.

{@--2@} To be wanting,
be omitted; be deprived of, be free
from.
